definitions.definition: Able to be changed in scale ; resizeable .
Able to greatly increase in capacity , with relative ease.
Suitable to provide accurate dimensions to manufacturing staff by being measured and having the measurements multiplied by the scale factor.
labels: of an engineering drawing or its features
definitions.label_groups: manufacturing , of an engineering drawing or its features

secondary_definitions: Able to be changed in scale ; resizeable . [from 20th c.]
( computing , logistics , business ) Able to greatly increase in capacity , with relative ease. [from 1980s]

( manufacturing , of an engineering drawing or its features ) Suitable to provide accurate dimensions to manufacturing staff by being measured and having the measurements multiplied by the scale factor.
